description.zh-cn: 蒙古皇族，成吉思汗之孙，拖雷与唆鲁禾帖尼的幼子。在兄长蒙哥汗去世后，与四哥忽必烈争夺汗位，引发拖雷家族内战，最终兵败被俘，不久后去世。
description.en: A Mongol prince, grandson of Genghis Khan, and the youngest son of Tolui and Sorghaghtani Beki. After the death of his brother Möngke Khan, he contended for the throne with his fourth brother Kublai, leading to the Toluid Civil War. He was ultimately defeated, captured, and died shortly after.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古皇族，成吉思汗的第四子，也是蒙哥、忽必烈、旭烈兀和阿里不哥的父亲。
description.en: A Mongol prince, the fourth son of Genghis Khan, and the father of Möngke, Kublai, Hulagu, and Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷的正妻，蒙哥、忽必烈、旭烈兀和阿里不哥的母亲。
description.en: The principal wife of Tolui and the mother of Möngke, Kublai, Hulagu, and Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国的创始人和第一位大汗，拖雷的父亲。
description.en: The founder and first Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, father of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 大蒙古国第四位大汗，拖雷与唆鲁禾帖尼的长子。
description.en: The fourth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, the eldest son of Tolui and Sorghaghtani Beki.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古皇族，拖雷与唆鲁禾帖尼的第四子。在兄长蒙哥汗去世后，与弟弟阿里不哥争夺汗位并获胜，后于1271年建立元朝。
description.en: A Mongol prince, the fourth son of Tolui and Sorghaghtani Beki. After the death of his brother Möngke Khan, he contended for the throne with his younger brother Ariq Böke and emerged victorious, later establishing the Yuan dynasty in 1271.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古皇族，拖雷与唆鲁禾帖尼的第六子，伊儿汗国的建立者。
description.en: A Mongol prince, the sixth son of Tolui and Sorghaghtani Beki, and the founder of the Ilkhanate.

description.zh-cn: 13世纪由成吉思汗建立的帝国，阿里不哥和忽必烈曾争夺其最高统治者大汗之位。
description.en: An empire founded by Genghis Khan in the 13th century, for whose supreme title of Great Khan Ariq Böke and Kublai Khan competed.

description.zh-cn: 指非汉族群在文化、社会等方面被汉族同化的过程。在蒙古帝国时期，忽必烈推行汉化政策，而阿里不哥则对此表示反对。
description.en: The process by which non-Han Chinese societies come under the influence of Han Chinese culture and societal norms. During the Mongol Empire, Kublai Khan promoted Sinicization policies, which were opposed by Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 1260年至1264年间，拖雷的两个儿子忽必烈与阿里不哥为争夺蒙古帝国大汗之位而爆发的内战。战争以忽必烈胜利告终，但也导致了蒙古帝国走向分裂。
description.en: A civil war fought between two of Tolui's sons, Kublai and Ariq Böke, from 1260 to 1264 for the title of Great Khan of the Mongol Empire. The war ended in Kublai's victory but led to the division of the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 大蒙古国的首都，蒙哥汗在位时由阿里不哥驻守。
description.en: The capital of the Mongol Empire, where Ariq Böke was stationed during the reign of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古及一些突厥语族的政治和军事议事会。1260年，蒙古本土贵族在此推举阿里不哥为大汗。
description.en: A political and military council of Mongol and some Turkic peoples. In 1260, the Mongol nobility in the homeland elected Ariq Böke as the Great Khan in a kurultai.

description.zh-cn: 由忽必烈于1271年在中国建立的王朝。
description.en: A dynasty of China established in 1271 by Kublai Khan.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥之子。
description.en: Son of Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥之子。
description.en: Son of Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥之子。
description.en: Son of Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥的玄孙，曾被拥立为伊儿汗。
description.en: Great-great-grandson of Ariq Böke, who was once enthroned as the Ilkhan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古四大汗国之一，由旭烈兀建立。
description.en: One of the four great khanates of the Mongol Empire, founded by Hulagu Khan.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥的后裔，被认为是北元时期的卓里克图汗，杀害了天元帝。
description.en: A descendant of Ariq Böke, believed to be Zorigthu Khan of the Northern Yuan, who assassinated Tögüs Temür.

description.zh-cn: 北元皇帝，后被阿里不哥后裔也速迭尔杀害。
description.en: An emperor of the Northern Yuan, later assassinated by Yesüder, a descendant of Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 元朝被明朝取代后，蒙古皇族退居蒙古高原而建立的政权。
description.en: The regime established by the Mongol royal family after they retreated to the Mongolian Plateau following the replacement of the Yuan dynasty by the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥是拖雷的幼子。
description.en: Ariq Böke was the youngest son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥是唆鲁禾帖尼的儿子。
description.en: Ariq Böke was the son of Sorghaghtani Beki.

description.zh-cn: 元宪宗蒙哥是拖雷的长子。
description.en: Möngke Khan was the eldest son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 元宪宗蒙哥是唆鲁禾帖尼的儿子。
description.en: Möngke Khan was the son of Sorghaghtani Beki.

description.zh-cn: 元世祖忽必烈是拖雷的第四子。
description.en: Kublai Khan was the fourth son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 元世祖忽必烈是唆鲁禾帖尼的儿子。
description.en: Kublai Khan was the son of Sorghaghtani Beki.

description.zh-cn: 旭烈兀是拖雷的第六子。
description.en: Hulagu Khan was the sixth son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 旭烈兀是唆鲁禾帖尼的儿子。
description.en: Hulagu Khan was the son of Sorghaghtani Beki.

description.zh-cn: 唆鲁禾帖尼是拖雷的正妻。
description.en: Sorghaghtani Beki was the principal wife of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷是成吉思汗的第四子。
description.en: Tolui was the fourth son of Genghis Khan.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥是元宪宗蒙哥的弟弟。
description.en: Ariq Böke was the younger brother of Möngke Khan.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥是元世祖忽必烈的弟弟。
description.en: Ariq Böke was the younger brother of Kublai Khan.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥是旭烈兀的弟弟。
description.en: Ariq Böke was the younger brother of Hulagu Khan.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥与忽必烈为争夺大汗之位展开了长达四年的内战。
description.en: Ariq Böke and Kublai Khan fought a four-year civil war over the title of Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈在内战中击败并俘虏了阿里不哥，阿里不哥于两年后去世，可能被忽必烈毒杀。
description.en: Kublai Khan defeated and captured Ariq Böke in the civil war. Ariq Böke died two years later, possibly poisoned by Kublai.

description.zh-cn: 1260年4月，阿里不哥在哈拉和林被蒙古本土贵族通过库力台大会推举为大蒙古国大汗。
description.en: In April 1260, Ariq Böke was elected as the Great Khan of the Mongol Empire by the Mongol nobility in a Kurultai held in Karakorum.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷家族内战最终导致了蒙古帝国的永久性分裂。
description.en: The Toluid Civil War ultimately led to the permanent division of the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥素来反对其兄长忽必烈的汉化政策。
description.en: Ariq Böke had long opposed his brother Kublai's Sinicization policies.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈推行汉化政策，这成为其与阿里不哥矛盾的焦点之一。
description.en: Kublai Khan promoted Sinicization policies, which became one of the focal points of his conflict with Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈于至元八年（1271年）建立元朝。
description.en: Kublai Khan established the Yuan dynasty in the eighth year of the Zhiyuan era (1271).

description.zh-cn: 药木忽儿是阿里不哥的儿子。
description.en: Yomuqur was a son of Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 明里帖木儿是阿里不哥的儿子。
description.en: Melik-temür was a son of Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 乃剌忽不花是阿里不哥的儿子。
description.en: Nairiqu-buqa was a son of Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 阿儿巴是阿里不哥的玄孙。
description.en: Arpa Ke'un was a great-great-grandson of Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 阿儿巴曾短暂地被拥立为伊儿汗。
description.en: Arpa Ke'un was briefly enthroned as the Ilkhan.

description.zh-cn: 也速迭尔是阿里不哥的后裔。
description.en: Yesüder was a descendant of Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 也速迭尔杀害了北元天元帝。
description.en: Yesüder assassinated Tögüs Temür, the emperor of Northern Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 天元帝是北元的皇帝。
description.en: Tögüs Temür was an emperor of the Northern Yuan.
